title: Washer/Dryer, Microwave, Short Term Lease, Window Coverings
posting_body: ['New Heights in Apartment Living', "Welcome to Miro Apartments where you'll find elements of modern living and sophistication blended together to give you a Home you’ll love", 'Located just inside the gated Villages of Santa Fe Springs offering Hard Flooring, Washer and Dryer in-unit, Stainless Steel Appliances, Kitchen Islands, Nest Thermostats, En-Suite Bathrooms in select Homes, and Assigned Parking.', 'Visit "liveatMiro" to take a virtual tour of your new home.', 'Here, contemporary luxury is green and sustainable, and you’ll benefit from the connected, mobile lifestyle you expect.', 'And LA and Orange County are just minutes away via the freeway.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 52', 'OR Text', '52', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact us.', 'Interested In This Unit?', 'Use this link for more details:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 920 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Ceiling Fan', '- Large Closets', '- High Ceilings', '- Patio/Balcony', '- Security Alarm', '- Cable Ready', '- Refrigerator', '- Efficient Appliances', '- Window Coverings', '- Washer/Dryer', '- Gas Range', '- Electronic Thermostat', '- Hardwood Floors', '- Carpeting', '- Disposal', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Dishwasher', '- Microwave', 'Community Amenities', '- Kitchen Islands', '- Pet Park', '- Spanish Speaking Staff', '- On-Site Management', '- Gourmet Grilling Stations', '- Privacy Gates with Remote Access', '- Recreation Room', '- Balcony and Patio', '- Night Patrol', '- On-Site Maintenance', '- Recycling', '- Private Garages', '- Carport', '- Recycle Bins', '- Electric Car Charging Stations', '- Clubhouse', '- Short Term Lease', '- Covered Parking', '- Spa/Hot Tub', '- Free Weights', '- Fitness Center', '- Pool with Heated Spa', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats - 2 allowed, Rent $50.00, Deposit $500.00', 'Dogs - 2 allowed, Rent $50.00, Deposit $500.00', 'Restricted breeds include: Alaskan Malamute, Boxer, Chow Chow, Dalmatian, Doberman Pinscher, German Sheperd, Belgian Malinois, Husky Breeds, Stafforshire Terrier, Presa Canario, Rottweiler and Wolf Hybrids', 'Miro', '12257 Heritage Springs Dr., Santa Fe Springs, CA, 90670', 'Greystar California, Inc., Broker License #01525765', 'DMCA Agent: <URL>', 'QZ9Y7XzvL1d']
